title: ???? Graphic Designer – E-commerce Ads & Product Listings
job_overview:
???? Graphic Designer – E-commerce Ads & Product Listings

We’re looking for a talented Graphic Designer to bring our brand to life through high-converting static ads and product listings. You’ll be working in Figma, translating our creative input and examples into visuals that match our brand identity and speak to our audience.

This role is about execution – we’ll guide you with concepts, but you’ll be responsible for making it visually stand out. Strong understanding of layout, typography, and e-commerce design principles is a must.

We are looking for someone for minimum 20 hours a week with option to go for fulltime. Your salary is based on experience.

Please watch the Loom video to learn more about the job and how to apply: Upgrade to see actual info

Kind regards,
Tom
